instructions: Identify common basketball actions performed in the video. Use the provided labels.

actions.label: Shooting
actions.description: Player attempting to score by throwing the ball at the hoop.

actions.label: Passing
actions.description: Player throwing the ball to a teammate.

actions.label: Running
actions.description: Player moving quickly across the court.

actions.label: Blocking
actions.description: Player legally deflecting a shot attempt.
